name: CLARITY_BCB
description: This table contains information about your bed charge billing table. The records included in this table are Bed Charge Billing Procedure (BCB) tables.

columns.name: TABLE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the bed charge billing table record.

columns.name: TABLE_ID_TABLE_NAME
columns.description: The name for the bed charge billing table.

columns.name: TABLE_NAME
columns.description: The name for the bed charge billing table.
